mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pNo, id,pTitle , pPrice, pShipping, pChange, pContents, pCategory, pIsUsed, pRegdate, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize) VALUES(prd_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{pTitle}, #{pPrice}, #{pShipping},#{pChange},#{pContents},#{pCategory},#{pIsUsed},SYSDATE,#{orgFileName},#{saveFileName},#{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM product where id=id ORDER BY pNo DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
